在 Forrester 总体经济影响研究中，Cynet 实现了 426% 的投资回报率https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/cynet-delivers-426-percent-roi-in-forrester-total-economic-impact-study/ Thu, 31 Oct 2024 07:00:00 -0400由 Cynet 赞助Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/cynet-delivers-426-percent-roi-in-forrester-total-economic-impact-study/ A commissioned study conducted by Forrester Consulting on behalf of Cynet in October 2024 found that Cynet's All-in-One Cybersecurity Platform generated $2.73 million in savings, paying for itself in under six months, for a return on investment of 426%.
